replies.bodyText:
(A) Great catch about the first exception, which went missing. Adding it as suppressed to the second exception looks right to me because the code that lead to the second exception did indeed suppress the first.
(B) I would still add the second exception as cause to the final (third) one because that causal chain represents well what actually happened.
As far as I can tell the code still does (A) and I would keep it that way.
